function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of depression and PTSD among quarantined people during the COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health problems and psychosocial morbidity","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and interventions for those in quarantine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling, and mental health apps","People":"Quarantined individuals","Owner":"Healthcare providers and mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Burden of the pandemic and prevalence of mental health problems","Impact":"Worsening of mental health issues and increased psychosocial morbidity","Mitigation":"Implement public health interventions and provide mental health resources","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online mental health resources","People":"Population affected by the pandemic","Owner":"Public health authorities and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Prevalence of symptoms of anxiety, depression, and trauma related to COVID-19","Impact":"High levels of mental distress and potential long-term mental health problems","Mitigation":"Provide mental health education, support, and access to mental health services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online mental health resources, mental health apps","People":"Those affected by COVID-19","Owner":"Public health organizations, healthcare providers, and mental health professionals"}]}
